verse.name: v1
verse.lines: As the morning dawns and evening fades newline You inspire songs of praise newline That rise from earth to touch Your heart newline And glorify Your name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Your name newline is a strong and mighty tower newline Your name newline is a shelter like no other newline Your name newline let the nations sing it louder newline 'Cause nothin has the power to save but newline Your name

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus in Your name we pray newline Come and fill our hearts today newline Lord give us strength to live for You newline And glorify Your name
